question_number.1: When I share music with someone I feel a special connection with that person.
question_number.2: In my free time I hardly listen to music
question_number.3: I like to listen to music that contains emotion
question_number.4: Music keeps me company when I’m alone
question_number.5: I don’t like to dance, not even with music I like
question_number.6: Music makes me bond with other people
question_number.7: I inform myself about music I like
question_number.8: I get emotional listening to certain pieces of music
